meta.title: MCP Probe Kit - AI-Powered Complete Development Toolkit | 21 Tools Covering Entire Development Lifecycle
meta.description: MCP Probe Kit provides 21 AI-powered development tools covering requirements analysis, code development, quality assurance, bug fixing, and release management. Supports Cursor, Cline, Claude Desktop with 100% structured output.
meta.keywords: MCP Probe Kit, AI development tools, code generation, code review, Git tools, UI development, development efficiency, Cursor, Cline, Claude, MCP Server

hero.title: üöÄ MCP Probe Kit
hero.subtitle: AI Development Enhancement Toolkit ¬∑ Documentation Center

quickStart.description: Get started with MCP Probe Kit v3.0.3 in 5 minutes

gettingStarted.title: Installation & Configuration
gettingStarted.subtitle: Get started with MCP Probe Kit v3.0.3 in 5 minutes. Supports Cursor, Cline, and Claude Desktop

npx.title: Use npx Directly
npx.description: No installation required, use the latest version directly:
npx.advantageText: No manual updates needed, automatically uses the latest version on each startup

source.title: Build from Source
source.description: Build from source code, suitable for developers:
source.tipText: Windows users should use full path, e.g.
source.noteText: After modifying code, need to re-run

step2.title: Locate Configuration File
step2.description: Find the corresponding configuration file based on your MCP client:

cursor.title: Cursor / Cline
cursor.description: Create or edit in project root directory
cursor.tipText: Cursor and Cline use project-level configuration, each project can have independent MCP server configuration.

step3.title: Verify Installation
step3.description: After completing configuration, verify with the following steps:
step3.step1: Restart MCP client (Cursor / Cline / Claude Desktop)
step3.step2Command: Please use gencommit tool to generate a test commit message
step3.step3: If it returns a commit message following Conventional Commits specification, installation is successful!
step3.issue1: "Tool not found" ‚Üí Check configuration file format
step3.issue2: "Command not found" ‚Üí Confirm Node.js is installed
step3.issue3: Windows users ‚Üí Ensure using npx method

step4.title: Delegated Orchestration Protocol
step4.description: orchestration tools do not execute operations directly, but return an executable plan.
step4.tipText3: files are actually written to disk

q1.title: Issue 1: Module resolution error caused by npx cache

q2.title: Issue 2: MCP server connection failed
q2.step2: If below v16, please upgrade Node.js
q2.step4: Check if configuration file JSON format is correct

migration.title: v3.0 Migration Guide
migration.subtitle: Smoothly migrate from v2.x to v3.0, understand breaking changes and new features

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: MCP Probe Kit v3.0 is a major version update, streamlined to 20 core tools, bringing more powerful features and better development experience.
overview.migrationTimeText: Most projects can complete migration in 10-15 minutes, v2.x core tools remain compatible in v3.0.

toolsOptimization.title: 1. Tools Streamlining
toolsOptimization.description: v2.x: 39 tools ‚Üí v3.0: 20 core tools (removed low-frequency tools, kept high-value tools)

workflows.title: 2. New Workflow Orchestration
workflows.description2: workflow orchestration tools, providing end-to-end automated development process:

structuredOutput.title: 4. Structured Output Upgrade
structuredOutput.description: Core and orchestration tools prioritize structured output, consistent and predictable output format, facilitating tool chaining and state tracking.

step1.title: Step 1: Update Version
step1.npxDesc: # No action needed, automatically uses latest version

step2.title: Step 2: Check Configuration File
step2.description: v3.0 configuration file format is fully compatible with v2.x, no modification needed.
step2.compatibleText: v2.x core tools remain compatible in v3.0, seamless upgrade possible.

help.title: Get Help
help.description: If you encounter problems during migration:

examples.title: Best Practices
examples.subtitle: MCP Probe Kit integrates complete development process, best practices guide from requirements to deployment

overview.title: Complete Development Process
overview.description: MCP Probe Kit's 21 tools cover the complete development process from requirements analysis to code deployment. Here are the recommended best practices.
overview.coreIdeaText: Chain the entire development process through workflow orchestration tools (start_*), making AI your development assistant.

stage0.title: Stage 0: Product Design (From Requirements to Prototype)

workflow.title: 0.1 Complete Product Design Workflow (Recommended)
workflow.description2: workflow orchestration to complete the entire product design from requirements to HTML prototype with one click.
workflow.example1: You: I have a product requirements document project.md, help me generate complete product design

prd.title: 0.2 Generate PRD Document Separately
prd.description2: tool to generate product requirements document separately.
prd.example1: You: Generate a PRD for an online education platform
prd.description3: Online education platform with course management, video playback, and assignment submission
prd.aiCreate: ‚Üí AI creates docs/prd/product-requirements.md based on guidance
prd.item1: - Product Overview (vision, target users, core value)

prototype.title: 0.3 Generate HTML Interactive Prototype
prototype.description2: tool to generate HTML prototype based on prototype documents.
prototype.desc: Generate HTML prototypes for all pages based on prototype documents
prototype.step1: ‚úì Read all prototype documents under docs/prototype/
prototype.step2: ‚úì Read docs/design-system.json to get design specifications
prototype.step3: ‚úì Generate HTML files for each page
prototype.feature1: - Uses design system colors and fonts

summary.title: 0.4 Product Design Workflow Summary
summary.step2b: to generate complete product design with one click
summary.step4: Review prototype with team and collect feedback
summary.step5: Adjust prototype documents based on feedback
summary.step7: Proceed to development phase after confirmation

init.title: 1.1 New Project Initialization
init.description2: to generate project documents following Spec-Driven Development approach.
init.example1: You: I want to create a task management system
init.input: Task management system with task creation, assignment, tracking, and reminders
init.generate: ‚Üí Generate: Requirements document, design document, task list

interview.title: 1.2 Requirements Clarification (Avoid Misunderstandings)
interview.q2: - Do you need to remember login status?

estimate.title: 1.3 Workload Estimation
estimate.description2: tool to estimate development time and resources.
estimate.time: - Time Range: Optimistic 3 days / Normal 5 days / Pessimistic 8 days
estimate.risk: - Risk: Third-party login integration may be delayed

workflow.title: 2.1 Complete Feature Development Workflow (Recommended)
workflow.description2: workflow orchestration to complete from spec to estimation with one click.

ui.title: 2.2 UI Development Workflow
ui.description2: workflow, from design system to code in one go.

codegen.title: 2.3 Code Generation
codegen.description: Use various generation tools as needed:

review.title: 3.1 Comprehensive Code Review (Recommended)
review.description2: workflow to complete code review, security scan, and performance analysis at once.

single.title: 3.2 Single Item Check
single.description: Use single tools for specific issues:

bugfix.title: 4.1 Systematic Bug Fix (Recommended)
bugfix.description2: workflow for one-stop solution from analysis to testing.
bugfix.example1: You: Login function is throwing an error

quick.title: 4.2 Quick Bug Analysis
quick.description2: tool to quickly analyze issues and provide fix solutions.

release.title: 5.1 Automated Release Process (Recommended)
release.description2: workflow to automatically generate Changelog and PR descriptions.
release.step2: ‚úì Generate PR description (change summary, impact scope)

git.title: 5.2 Git Workflow
git.description: Use Git tools to improve collaboration efficiency:

onboard.title: 6.1 New Member Onboarding
onboard.description2: workflow to quickly understand the project.
onboard.example1: New member: I just joined the project, need to understand the project structure

doc.title: 6.2 Documentation Maintenance
doc.description2: workflow to complete project documentation with one click.

loop.title: Automated Loop Development
loop.description2: to start automated development loop, AI continuously iterates until goal is achieved.

warning.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Safety Notice:
warning.text: Ralph Loop enables multiple safety protections by default (max iterations, runtime, code change limits) to prevent runaway.

summary.title: Best Practices Summary
summary.principle1: Prioritize workflow orchestration tools (start_*) - automate complete processes
summary.principle2: Use interview during requirements phase - avoid misunderstandings
summary.principle3: Use estimate before development - plan time reasonably
summary.principle4: Use start_review before commit - ensure code quality
summary.principle5: Use start_release before release - standardize release process
